name: Super Chick Maker 2
description:
READ THIS OR THIS GAME WILL BE VERY CONFUSING!!!

Welcome to Super Chick Maker...2! You probably know the controls. Click something to make a clone of it. new stuff will come in following updates!

New: Improved barrier, slopes, Koopa shells, pipes, saws (Work in progress), Spikes, spike, Fire bar, Crouch, Lava, Signs, Fall blocks, Walk-Through blocks.

Coming soon: A shop to purchase items, inventory.

----------------------Instructions------------------------------

Player 1:

Making: Drag stuff to move it around. To make more, click it to make a clone. Press e to erase.

Use t to show the angry sun and h to hide it.

Use t or u to enter text onto the sign

Playing: Use the arrow keys. Down to crouch, up to jump, and left and right to move.

Upload instructions below.

How to save: Finish your course. Remix it. Press see inside. Once finished loading, click save. Then, share your project and show the world! (Note: You can only place each block once. Ground and slopes don't work.)

Player 2:

Making: Use wasd to move your hand. You can't make clones. Press space over an object to move it. It's kinda glitchy.

Playing: Use the wasd keys.. s to crouch, w to jump, and a and d to move.
